title: Team USA's Olympic Chances, Dame's Future, Can The Bucks Close Out The Finals?
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss Team USA Basketball’s chances in the Olympics, the challenges facing the roster, Damian Lillard’s status in Portland, potential moves the Blazers can make, the impact of Jrue Holiday on the NBA Finals and if the Bucks can close out the series.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
